HPI 8229 Lancia Delta Integrale 16V 1991 Rallye Sanremo – Rallye d'Italia Winner D. Auriol/B. Occelli

Manufacturer Page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8229/8229.html

6th WRC win for Didier Auriol
65th WRC win for Lancia
11th WRC win for Delta Integrale 16V

Didier Auriol and Bernard Occelli drove for Lancia's "B-Team" run by Jolly Club for the 1991 season. Italian lottery organization Totip usually sponsored Jolly Club's entries but Fina was paying the bills in 1991.

Auriol & Occelli led nearly all of the 31 stage rally. Miki Biasion was able to take the lead from them but only for 3 stages on the 2nd day of the 5 day event. This gave Lancia their 65th WRC win and it would be another 17 years until another manufacturer racked up more wins: Ford's 66th win came in 2008!
